sourcesContent:
Edit Categories

Ce champ est obligatoire est de 4 charachteres mimum.
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Shop } from 'src/app/models/shop'; import { CategoryService } from 'src/app/services/category.service'; import { ShopService } from 'src/app/services/shop.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-shop', templateUrl: './edit-shop.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-shop.component.scss'] }) export class EditShopComponent implements OnInit { idShop!: number; shop!: Shop; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private shopservice: ShopService, private router: Router, ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.idShop = parseInt(this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id') ?? '0'); this.loadShop(); } loadShop(): void { this.shopservice.retrieveShop(this.idShop).subscribe( category => { this.shop = this.shop; console.log("shop loaded successfully.", category); }, error => console.log(error) ); } updateShop(): void { console.log(this.shop) this.shopservice.updateShop(this.shop).subscribe( response => { console.log("shop updated successfully.", response); this.router.navigate(['/list-shop']); }, error => console.log(error) ); } }
